===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# Sugar-coated tablets with a blackish-grey core that is used in [[traditional Chinese medicine]] "to nourish [[yin]] and remove ''heat'', to ease the mind and induce tranquilization in the treatment of menopausal syndrome marked by afternoon fever, excessive sweating, dizziness, tinnitus, insomnia and unsteady blood pressure".

Gengnian'an tablets have the following ingredients:
